definition: to have an in depth conversation/to have intimate talks/to discuss thoroughly
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: He was in the depth of despair.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題我沒同他深談。

sentences.english: I didn't go in depth into the matter with him.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題我沒同他深談。

sentences.english: Don't talk loudly about too personal things in public.
sentences.chinese: 在人多的場合不宜大聲深談。

sentences.english: That night, my father and I talk, depicting his ambition.
sentences.chinese: 那晚，我和父親深談，描繪自己的理想抱負。

sentences.english: There were three professors at the railway station. They were deep in conversation.
sentences.chinese: 有三位教授在火車站，他們正在深談。

sentences.english: If a woman shuts off, there's trouble brewing and it's time for deep discussion.
sentences.chinese: 如果女人閉了嘴，那是在醞釀麻煩，你該和她深談了。
